Before shutting himself down for a rest, Tucson's extremely sharp audio rec=
eptors pick up Legacy's transmission, which gets him to quickly sit up.  He=
 says nothing as he listens intently to the message.

" Greetings, Legacy, =
this is Autobot Tucson responding to your message.  I have been on leave du=
e to severe damages taken during a battle some time ago, which have left pa=
rt of my memory erased. I - am now with Lord Perseus's Maximal group, in re=
covery from another damage taken in battle."

He sighs.

"Sorry, - I'm - ju=
st not a hundred percent at the - moment.  Anyway, you may be able to answe=
r this question for me.  I - need to know, if - there are - any remaining A=
utobots still functioning."  
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "supercyclonus=
" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Deep inside the ancient ship called the Ar=
k, most of the power has been shut down into power conservation mode. Much =
of the ship's systems have been returned to either a defensive mode, turned=
 down so low so that millions of years from now the Autobots and Decepticon=
s that rest here in in's heart will have the power to reawaken when the tim=
e comes. 
> 
> However off to one side, inside one of the repair pods chamb=
ers, one that could possible have housed one of the tape sized transformers=
 a dim light blinks. It's a light that had been blinking for quite some tim=
e, slowly, over the course of several months shifting from a crimson red, t=
o an amber, then yellow, and now for the first time it blinks once and then=
 turns a steady green. 
> 
> A pop and hiss can be heard as the door of the=
 pod clicks and then slides to the side. Inside the repair pod the cold cyc=
lopean visage of its singular inhabitant can be just made out as smoke and =
other repair fumes escape from the chamber and into the air of the surround=
ing room. The occupant's single optic blinks as the figure comes online and=
 then gleams a stead crimson hue as the figure jerks once and awakens fully=
.
> 
> The deck plating clanks as the figure steps out and looks around, ta=
king a moment to get its bearings. Everything appears to be alright, its cr=
imson gaze seeming to pierce the darkness of this chamber with ease. 
> 
> =
A few steps takes the figure to a control panel that is posiioned off to on=
e side. One that is obviously ot part of the original construction, but has=
 only been put here more recently. With a few deft touches it lights up and=
 with startling speed information began to scroll across it. A recording of=
 an Autobot transmission has been recorded, as well as strange sensor recor=
dings that may possibly be minion activity. 
> 
> "Greetings Autobots and M=
aximals" a cold voice transmited itself dually across Maximal and Autobot e=
ncrypted communication lines. "This is Legacy, and I have reawakened. Do yo=
u require assistance?"
> 
> <TAG>
> 
> Preston
> (Legacy)
> 
> OOC: please =
note that many of the Maximals/Autobots that participated in the big minion=
 battle that happened at the ark (about a year ago Real Time) may remember =
Legacy, how he appeared seeming to know many strange things about people, p=
rotected the Ark, was badly damaged in its defense and has not been heard f=
rom . . . until now.
>
